Load ground truth labels for the test dataset.

modeling.predict module#

modeling.predict.main(model_path=PosixPath('/Users/allan/Documents/GitHub/photomacros/models/model.pkl'), predictions_path=PosixPath('/Users/allan/Documents/GitHub/data/processed/test_predictions.pt'), test_data_path=PosixPath('/Users/allan/Documents/GitHub/photomacros/models/test_data.pt'), test_labels_output_path=PosixPath('/Users/allan/Documents/GitHub/data/processed/test_labels.csv'))[source]#

Main function to perform inference and save predictions with labels.

Parameters:

  • model_path (Path)

  • predictions_path (Path)

  • test_data_path (Path)

  • test_labels_output_path (Path)

modeling.predict.perform_inference(model_path, test_data_path, predictions_path, batch_size=32)[source]#

Perform inference on the test dataset using a trained model and save predictions to a file.

Args:

model_path (Path): Path to the trained model file (.pkl or .pth). test_data_path (Path): Path to the saved test dataset. predictions_path (Path): Path to save the predictions. batch_size (int): Batch size for DataLoader.

Parameters:

  • model_path (Path)

  • test_data_path (Path)

  • predictions_path (Path)

  • batch_size (int)

modeling.predict.save_test_labels(predictions, test_data_path, output_path)[source]#

Save predictions and corresponding labels to a file.

Args:

predictions (list): List of predicted labels. test_data_path (Path): Path to the test dataset file. output_path (Path): Path to save the labeled predictions.

Parameters:

  • test_data_path (Path)

  • output_path (Path)

modeling.train module#

modeling.train.get_augmentation_transforms()[source]#

Define on-the-fly augmentations and normalization for training data

modeling.train.get_model_architecture(image_size, num_classes)[source]#

Return the model architecture used for training. (used also in predict.py)

Args:

image_size (int): The size of the input image (assumes square images). num_classes (int): The number of output classes.
